heroSubtitle: Our platform connects you with finders and businesses to help you recover what's important.
feature1Desc: Search our database of lost and found items.
feature2Desc: Report a lost or found item and we'll notify you if there's a match.
feature3Desc: Manage lost and found for your business.
successQuote: I lost my laptop at the airport and thought it was gone forever. Thanks to this platform, it was found within hours!
faqLink1: How do I report a lost item?
faqLink2: What happens when my item is found?
faqLink3: How long do listings stay active?
faqLink4: Is it free to use this service?
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters
validation.subjectMin: Subject must be at least 5 characters
validation.messageMin: Message must be at least 10 characters
validation.messageMax: Message must be no more than 1000 characters
validation.itemNameMin: Item name must be at least 3 characters
validation.descriptionMin: Description must be at least 10 characters
validation.locationMin: Location must be at least 3 characters
validation.imageSize: Each image must be less than 5MB
validation.proofMin: Proof must be at least 20 characters
validation.storyMin: Story must be at least 10 characters
validation.storyMax: Story must be no more than 500 characters
loginSubtitle: Enter your email below to login to your account
signupSubtitle: Create an account to get started
contactSubtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Please fill out the form.
contactFormDesc: Fill out the form and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
contactToastSuccessDesc: Thanks for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon.
contactToastErrorDesc: Could not send your message. Please try again later.
contactInfoDesc: Reach out to us via email or phone.
contactFollowDesc: Keep up to date on our social channels.
forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a code to reset your password.
partnerDashboardSubtitle: Manage your reported items and enquiries.
partnerRecentItemsDesc: Here is a list of items you've recently reported.
partnerEnquiriesSubtitle: Review and manage claims for items you've reported.
partnerEnquiriesNoEnquiriesDesc: When someone makes a claim on one of your items, it will appear here.
partnerLoginSubtitle: Log in to manage your lost and found department.
partnerRegisterSubtitle: Register your business to efficiently manage lost and found items.
aboutSubtitle: We help you find what matters, one recovery at a time.
aboutMissionDesc: Our mission is to provide a single, trusted platform that makes it easy for individuals and organizations to return lost items to their rightful owners. We believe in the power of community and technology to bridge gaps and create moments of joy.
aboutValues1Desc: We operate with honesty and transparency in everything we do.
aboutValues2Desc: We understand the stress of losing something and the joy of finding it.
aboutValues3Desc: We leverage technology to simplify and speed up the recovery process.
aboutJoinDesc: Whether you've lost an item or found one, your participation makes a difference. Together, we can create more happy reunions.
accountSubtitle: Manage your reported items, claims, and profile settings.
accountNoSubmissions: You haven't reported any items yet.
accountNoSubmissionsDesc: Once you report a lost or found item, it will appear here.
accountNoClaims: You haven't made any claims yet.
accountNoClaimsDesc: When you make a claim on a found item, its status will show up here.
accountDeleteItemDesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your item listing.
browseSubtitle: Find what you're looking for, or see what others have found.
browseNoItemsDesc: Try changing your search or filter criteria.
browseItemNotFoundDesc: The item you requested could not be found. It may have been removed.
chatNotFoundDesc: The chat you are looking for does not exist or you do not have access to it.
hiwSubtitle: Recovering your lost items is simple and straightforward.
hiwStep1Desc: Fill out a simple form with details about your lost item.
hiwStep2Desc: If you find an item, post it to help the owner.
hiwStep3Desc: Our system will search for matches and notify you.
hiwStep4Desc: Communicate securely to arrange the return.
faq1Title: What should I do if I lose an item?
faq1Content: Click the 'Report a Lost Item' button and provide as many details as possible about your lost item, including photos and any distinguishing marks.
faq2Title: What if I find an item?
faq2Content: Click the 'I Found Something' button and fill in the details of the item. Don't reveal all the details, so the owner can identify it.
faq3Content: Yes, FindItNow is completely free for individuals. We also offer premium services for businesses.
faq4Title: How do I communicate with the person who has my item?
faq4Content: Once a potential match is found, you can communicate securely through our built-in chat system to verify the details and arrange the return.
faq5Content: Unclaimed items reported by our partners are subject to their policies. For items reported by individuals, we encourage finders to hand them over to local authorities after a reasonable time.
faq6Title: How can my business use FindItNow?
faq6Content: We offer a partner dashboard for businesses like hotels, airports, and malls to manage their lost and found items efficiently. Visit our 'For Business' page to learn more.
privacyIntroContent: This Privacy Policy describes our practices regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of your information through the FindItNow website.
privacyInfoCollectContent1: Personal Information: When you register, report an item, or make a claim, we may collect information such as your name, email address, and contact details.
privacyInfoCollectContent2: User-Generated Content: We collect information you provide about lost or found items, including descriptions and photos.
privacyInfoUseContent: Your information is used to operate and maintain our service, connect you with other users for item returns, send you notifications, and improve our services.
privacyInfoShareContent: We do not share your personal contact information without your consent. When a potential match is found, we facilitate communication through our secure platform.
privacyInfoKeepContent: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you with our services.
privacyInfoSafeContent: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or disclosure.
privacyMinorsContent: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
privacyRightsContent: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Please contact us to exercise these rights.
reportFormLostDesc: Please provide as much detail as possible below. The more information you provide, the better the chances of recovering your item.
reportFormFoundDesc: Thank you for taking the time to report a found item. Please describe the item. Withhold some details so the owner can identify it.
reportFormDescPlaceholder: Provide a detailed description of the item, including color, brand, size, etc.
reportFormLocationPlaceholder: e.g., Central Park, near the fountain
reportFormContactEmailDescNew: This email will be used for sign-in and notifications. We will send a verification code.
reportFormContactEmailDescAuth: You are logged in. Notifications will be sent to this email.
reportFormContactEmailDescExisting: Edit mode: Contact email cannot be changed.
reportFormPhonePlaceholder: Your phone number for easier contact
reportFormImageDescNew: Upload up to 5 images of the item. The first will be the main image.
reportFormImageDescExisting: Add new images to update the listing.
reportFormEditDesc: Update the details of your reported item below.
servicesSubtitle: Tailored solutions for individuals and businesses.
servicesIndividualDesc: Simple, fast, and free for everyone.
servicesBusinessDesc: Streamline the lost and found process.
servicesReadyDesc: Join our community and experience the easiest way to handle lost and found.
termsAgreementContent: By accessing the site, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
termsServiceDescContent: FindItNow provides a platform to connect users who have lost items with those who have found them. We do not guarantee the recovery of any item.
termsUserConductContent: You agree not to use the site for any unlawful purpose or to post any false or misleading information.
termsDisclaimersContent: The service is provided 'as is'. We make no warranties about the accuracy of content provided by users.
termsLiabilityContent: FindItNow will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from your use of the service.
termsGoverningLawContent: These terms shall be governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which the company is registered.
itemResolvedDesc: This item has been successfully returned to its owner.
isThisYourItemDesc: If you believe this item is yours, submit a claim to start the verification process.
cannotClaimOwnItem: You cannot claim your own item.
claimFormProofPlaceholder: Describe the item in detail. What makes it unique? (e.g., contents of the bag, scratch on the phone, wallpaper)
claimFormProofImageDesc: Have a photo that proves it's yours? (e.g. you with the item)
toastClaimSubmittedDesc: Your claim has been sent to the reporter. You'll be notified when it's accepted.
haveYouFoundThisDesc: If you believe you have found this item, send an anonymous message to the owner to coordinate the return.
feedbackDesc: We're thrilled you've been reunited with your {{itemName}}! Please take a moment to rate your experience.
feedbackDefaultStory: I was so relieved to get my {{itemName}} back!
feedbackToastSuccessDesc: Your feedback has been submitted. We're glad you found your item!
feedbackToastErrorDesc: Could not submit your feedback. Please try again later.
enquiriesSubtitle: Review and respond to enquiries from people who have found your lost items or are claiming your found items.
enquiriesNoEnquiriesDesc: When someone sends an enquiry about one of your items, it will appear here.
accountAcceptResolutionPrompt: The item owner has marked this as resolved. Please accept to finalize the deal.
toastEnquiryResolvingDesc: Waiting for the claimant to confirm they have received the item.
chatDealClosedDesc: This item has been successfully resolved and the chat is now archived.
chatDisabledPlaceholder: Chat is disabled for this conversation.
toastClaimAcceptedDesc: You can now chat with the claimant to arrange the return.
